We can estimate the earnestness of the Pharisaic retort that his inspiration was Satanic when we again reflect what would be our mental attitude towards a being as evidently exalted and powerful who should to-day appear and contradict what seem to us the obvious tenets of revealed religion, reviling us for our favourite forms of piety.
